page.title: 11A Walk Along The River Don.
page.content: We walked from Brig O'Buchat, overlooked by Glenbuchat Castle to old Towie Brig,built 1884.Dry stone dykes still preserve the boundaries. Rich arable farmland floors the U shaped Valley.Mixed farming is on lower slopes.Above,on rough ground, hill sheep and cattle graze.Belts of wood- land fall short of heather grouse moor over hill tops.Example of Basket of Eggs Topography,sand & gravel glacial deposits are quaried.On river banks, eroded by water,wind and frost were schist rocks and other metamorphic stones,Quartzose and Mica.In abundance is grey granite.Nature abounds round every corner.Games played by us en- route;Carl Doddies or Plantains used for soldiers.Children try to knock heads from friends Plantains.The remaining Plantain wins.Dandylion Witch's Clock.Count blows to tell time
